title: Economic benefits of Wales’ creative industries reason to celebrate ahead of BAFTA Cymru (Welsh Government) ...
text: ( Source : Welsh Government ) Due to be held at the Wales Millennium Centre on Sunday, BAFTA Cymru will honour excellence in Welsh film and television. The Creative Industries is a priority area for the Welsh Government and is now one of
